Desk - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.model
Desk is a class that contains: 4 deck of Card, one for each card type 2 displayed card list, 1 card that represent the first card of resource card deck 1 card that represent the first card of gold card deck some methods to pick a card Note: there are only card ids here, therefore only integers and not card objects
